name: C. Logo Turtle
statement:
A lot of people associate Logo programming language with turtle
graphics. In this case the turtle moves along the straight line and
accepts commands "" ("turn around") and "" ("move 1 unit forward").You
are given a list of commands that will be given to the turtle. You have
to change exactly commands from the list (one command can be changed
several times). How far from the starting point can the turtle move
after it follows the commands of the modified list?
